Exquisite Software is an on-shore software development provider that builds innovative technologies and platforms that power business. Our team of creative designers and expert engineers is perfectly balanced with a deep understanding of user-experience, technology, marketing and business allowing us to tackle applications of various complexity. Company HistoryExquisite Software was founded in 2007 in Phoenix, Arizona. Our many clients range from startups and home-based businesses to Fortune 1000 enterprises, allowing Exquisite Software to provide unparalleled value through experience and expertise in a variety of areas such as with SMB's, Medical, Manufacturers, Marketing & Advertising, Technology, and Legal industries.Our CommitmentOur clientsâ€™ success is our number one priority. Communication and structure is key to that success. We have developed a seamless system ensuring a streamlined process from concept to release. As an on-shore software development provider, we are available during standard business hours to address any technical issue at critical times. We seek to build long lasting relationships as a development partner, and to your advantage; weâ€™ll remain at your side well past user-onboarding.

summary: I am the Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Exquisite Software, I have managed software companies for over 15 years, and have been developing custom software for over 23 years. As the CEO of Exquisite Software, my core responsibilities are long-term strategic planning, growth, product development, partnerships, team building and communicating the culture.As a student at the University of Advancing Technologies, I studied Software Engineering and Database Development. My love for technology has allowed me to continually grow my education by utilizing mentors, courses, and through hands-on experience over the last 23 years.My past clients have ranged from SMB's to Enterprises such as Twilio, Pizza Hut, CR Bard, Western Window System, Solar Innovations and have worked with companies in a variety of industries to release over 1,000 projects to market and helped ensure their success after launch by providing unparalleled customer support.I am hands-on as a developer, project manager, and leader to ensure the utmost success of each project. I have experience with Agile and Waterfall methodologies and use JIRA and Github in our daily operations. Previously, I have worked with HPC, Cryptography, Big Data & BI, Web Applications, SaaS based Applications, Enterprise Applications, Hardware Integrations, Application Security, Database Development, Automated Testing, Prototyping, Reverse Engineering, Wordpress, ERP's, PCI Compliant Applications & Payment Integrations, API Integrations & Development, PII/PHI & HIPAA Compliant Applications, TCP/IP and am familiar with many protocols.With our team's expertise in Enterprise Software, Mobile Applications, Web Applications, User-Experience, Marketing and Quality Assurance, you can feel comfortable knowing you are working with a fully qualified team of professionals.
name: Stephan Shere
title: Chief Executive Officer and Founder of Exquisite Software
